resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107138</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107138</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système Solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema Solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema Solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema Solar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines the solar system and NASA explorations in it. Learn about how the solar system formed, what we know about Mars, and the likelihood of earth colliding with an asteroid or comet.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft das Solarsystem und DIE NASA die 
Erforschungen in ihm. Erlernen Sie über, wie das Solarsystem 
sich bildete, was wir über Mars kennen und die Wahrscheinlichkeit von
Masse zusammenstoßend mit einem Planetoid oder einem Kometen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine le système solaire et des explorations de
la NASA dans lui. Renseignez-vous sur la façon dont le système
solaire a formé, ce que nous connaissons Mars, et la probabilité de 
la terre se heurtant un asteroïde ou une comète.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina o sistema solar e explorações da NASA 
nele. Aprenda sobre como o sistema solar deu forma, o que nós 
sabemos sobre Marte, e a probabilidade da terra que colide com um 
asteroid ou um cometa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli esamina il sistema solare e le esplorazioni 
della NASA. Impari circa come il sistema solare ha formato, che 
cosa conosciamo circa Marte e la probabilità di terra che si scontra 
con un asteroide o una cometa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις εξερευνήσεις ηλιακών συστημάτων και της 
NASA σε το. Μάθετε για το πώς το ηλιακό σύστημα 
διαμόρφωσε, τι ξέρουμε για τον Αρη, και την πιθανότητα της γης που
συγκρούεται με asteroid ή έναν κομήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina la Sistema Solar y exploraciones de la 
NASA en ella. Aprenda sobre cómo la Sistema Solar formó, qué 
sabemos sobre Marte, y la probabilidad de la tierra que choca con un 
asteroide o un cometa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206185</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107138</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/solar-system</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
